## Summary
- add `require_admin` authorization dependency in API deps
- enforce admin-only authorization on `/api/v1/bots` write endpoints (POST/PUT/DELETE)
- add RBAC tests for unauthenticated, non-admin, and admin access paths
- update test fixtures to provide authenticated admin client by default and keep explicit unauth coverage
- document admin-only bot write endpoints in README

## Testing
- `.venv/bin/pytest -q tests/test_auth.py tests/test_bots_rbac.py`
- `.venv/bin/pytest -q tests/test_bots.py tests/test_create_bot.py tests/test_update_bot.py tests/test_delete_bot.py tests/test_edit_page_integration.py tests/test_update_validation.py`

Closes #58
